text: Ashes and Diamonds is a 1958 Polish World War II drama movie directed by Andrzej Wajda and based on the 1948 novel of the same name by Jerzy Andrzejewski. It stars Zbigniew Cybulski, Ewa Krzy≈ºewska, Adam Pawlikowski, Ignacy Machowski and was distributed by KADR. ==Other websites== * * Category:1958 drama movies Category:1958 war movies Category:Polish drama movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Andrzej Wajda
title: Ashes and Diamonds (movie)
